eu.cqse.check.framework.util.tokens

Class TokenStreamTransformationPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.util.tokens.TokenStreamTransformationPattern

  • public class TokenStreamTransformationPattern
extends java.lang.Object
    Transforms a token stream according to a search and a replace pattern. Both patterns can contain variables in the form of $name.

    Example

    • Language: Java
    • Search Pattern: assertNotNull($a)
    • Replacement Pattern: $a != null
    • Input: assertNotNull(foo)
    • Output: foo != null
    Additionally, variables can be postfixed with a number, e.g. $a1 to signal that the code matched to $a1 should only be exactly 1 token in length.
